seg.source: 12日看点：田径开赛中国队很忙女足冲四自行车盼突破
seg.translation: Highlights for the 12th: China Team busy at work in athletics - Women's football entering the Top-4 - Cyclists seeking breakthrough
12th Watch: Track and field Team China is very busy women's soccer four bike hope to break
12 Watch: Athletics kick-off China is busy women's football team rushed four bicycles hoping for a breakthrough

seg.source: 自行车有望实现奥运金牌“零突破”，而女足姑娘将挑战两次世界冠军得主德国队，期待爆冷冲进四强。
seg.translation: There is a chance to achieve a breakthrough for “zero gold medals” for bicycle events in the Olympics. The women's football team will also challenge the German team, the two-times world champion, and people have hopes that they might make it to the top-4.
The bicycle is expected to achieve the Olympic gold medal "0 breakthrough", while the women's soccer girl will challenge two world champion Germany team, expect upset rushed into the top four.
Cycling is on track for a "zero breakthrough" in Olympic gold, while the women's soccer girls will challenge two-time world champion Germany in anticipation of a blowout into the top four.

seg.source: 王镇近两个赛季状态突出，去年北京田径世锦赛收获银牌，今年5月团体竞走世锦赛上又升级个人项目冠军。
seg.translation: Wang Zhen has exhibited outstanding performance for the last 2 seasons, winning a silver medal in the IAAF World Championships in Athletics in Beijing last year and became a personal event champion in the Group IAAF Race Walking Challenge in May this year.

Wang Town nearly two seasons in the state of prominence, last year's Beijing athletics World Championships Harvest Silver medal, this year May Group Race Walk Championships also upgraded individual project champion.

Wang has been in outstanding form for the past two seasons, winning a silver medal at the Athletics World Championships in Beijing last year and upgrading his individual event title at the Group Walking World Championships in May.
